ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hi I'm new
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Greg, Do a /who nec and see if there is a necro inzone that will summon your corpse for you. Ether that or wait 7 days and it will show up in shadowrest.
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Greg,
Do a /who nec and see if there is a necro inzone that
will summon your corpse for you. Ether that or wait 7
days and it will show up in shadowrest. You can still
make a new toon to play till that one claimable. As a
necromancer I get lots of calls to summon and rez in
places you would not catch a cleric alone :)
Good Luck,
Eqdivrel 66 necro of Povar

--- greg <gregdixon@...> wrote:

>
>
> Thank you for the input. I will try all that out.
>
> I think I am going to build a new char. I did
> something dumb. I went
> to high pass hold. I am now lvl 17--soon to be
> 16--just trying to
> recover my corpse. I figure once I get to low of lvl
> to even get
> inside high pass to get to my corpse, good time to
> build a new char.
> with better abilities. Sad to see all that work go
> to nothing though.
> This hef rgr seems to be a little retarded and
> handicapped. Too many
> blunt hits to the head I guess... lol :?))
>
> Maybe a gnome so I can learn tinkering. That sounds
> like fun.
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Martin Ashcraft
> <mrmarvinmars@y...>
> wrote:
